name: [SRETUSLO] filler is dropping > 10% Kafka rollups [TF]
description: Rollups are being dropped before being written to Kafka. This can be caused by too high load on the worker node or high processing pressure on the filler.  ## Consequences  Alerting and live metrics viewing in the UI will be affected.  ## Remediation  - Increasing the TU toggle `config.rollup.kafka.downstream.threads` (Default is 1. Shouldn't be more than 4).
